rukus.text: Or did those in whose hearts is a disease think that God will never bring out (and expose) their grudges
And if We want, We would show them to you, so you would know them by their appearance. And you would know them by tone of the words. And God knows your works
And We shall test you until We know those among you who try hard and persevere, and We examine your news
Indeed those who disbelieved and obstructed God’s way and opposed the messenger after the guidance became clear for them, they will never harm God a bit, and He is going to make their works useless
You who believe, obey God and obey the messenger and do not invalidate your works
Indeed those who disbelieved and obstructed God’s way, then died while they were disbelievers, God will never forgive them
So do not be weak and do not call for peace while you are superior and God is with you, and He will never cheat you out of your works
And this world’s life is only a play and an amusement. And if you believe and control yourselves, He gives you your wages and He would not ask you for your possessions
If He asks you for it (your possession) and presses you, you will be stingy and He would bring out (expose) your grudges

Here you are, being called to spend in God’s way, but some of you are stingy, and anyone who is stingy is only stingy against himself. And God is rich (and needless) and you are poor (and needy). And if you turn away, He replaces you with people other than you, then they will not be like you
